body: ???? only 3k favorites??? this is actually an ideal story, one that starts off gimmicky and slowly grows serious because the author realizes its potential as more than just a funny story. it might be cliche but at the end, it seriously tugs on the heartstrings, and deserves so much more recognition (maybe it got as much on webtoon or wherever) than this. the length awards it at the very least a 7/10, and the fact that NTR is included for a couple pages shouldnt take off a whole point or ruin the story, really. its by no means a masterpiece of art but if this was animated across 2 or 3 seasons (it has the content for it for sure) it would absolutely be popular, i guarantee it. what does it take to get a webtoon animated? because this shit right here has what it takes
Im just gonna leave a comment here in case
I couldn’t but but the story is straight fire, more
Wow bruh, came to nut but felt so satisfied with the story (still nutted though)

Good shit, was invested in the story but still nut worthy. My main complaints are 
1. It should have ended a little later with the whole harem back in the US or some shit like that
2. That NTR bullshit the author somehow felt the need to add
I wish that he ended up only with the red haired girl, but a harem ending is okay to
Don't understand if the ending is still harem or not
Story wa sgood but why ntr oof I really hate that being a thing

The story is good apart from the censoring stuff, and the student council president got what she fucking deserve . 

10/10 story would read it again
-IGN
